page.title: 07HOUSING - BREWOOD
page.content: HOUSING_CONTINUED {THE REST OF THE BLOCK The houses are mainly on estates.The majority of farm workers houses are Victorian and some of the other farms are older;there is Stretton Hall that is over 250yrs old.The majority are privately rented and a few are owner occupied.Nearly all the houses had a garage but a few did not.The average number of bedrooms is 3 but it varies with the size of the house.The average number of reception rooms is 2.This also varies.Solid fuel and gas central heating is the most common source of heat.The main types of insulation are cavity wall and loft.
